articles.title: How a family's choice to donate a body for pig kidney research could help change transplants - KSL.com
articles.description: Thousands of people die awaiting a transplant because of a dire shortage of donated organs. NYU's experiment offers important lessons as U.S. regulators consider whether to allow formal studies of pig kidneys in living patients.
